400.name: Bad Request
400.description: Client error, server cannot process the request. Try reconnecting to the wifi.

403.name: Forbidden
403.description: Server refuses to authorize the request.

404.name: Not Found
404.description: Requested URL was not found on this server.

405.name: Method Not Allowed
405.description: The method specified in the request is not allowed for the resource.

500.name: Internal Server Error
500.description: Server encountered a situation it doesn't know how to handle.

502.name: Bad Gateway
502.description: Invalid response from the upstream server.

503.name: Service Unavailable
503.description: Server is currently unable to handle the request.

auth.bad_code_all: Invalid code, ran out of attempts, start again
auth.bad_auth: If authorization failed, contact tech support
auth.missing_code: Code is missing, please enter the code
auth.expired_code: Code expired, a new code has been sent to you
auth.code_alredy_sended: Code already sent, please wait a minute

admin.end_tries: Too many attempts. Try again in {lockout_time} minutes.

login.title: Authorization
login.label_phone: Enter your phone number for authorization:

code.title: Code Confirmation
code.label_code: Please enter the code received in the SMS
code.validity_message: The code is valid for 5 minutes
code.resend_message: You can request a new code in
